channel.title: Arch on Kyle Rassweiler
channel.description: Recent content in Arch on Kyle Rassweiler

item.title: Arch Snapper BTRFS Install Guide
item.description: This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) with a BTRFS file system including subvolumes. This guide also covers using snapper and grub to create bootable snapshots.

item.title: Arch-Snapper-BTRFS Install Guide - Gaming Edition
item.description: This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) using a BTRFS file system including subvolumes for big-boy gaming.
